clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
